Package estimation.util

Class ComputerInput

java.lang.Object
estimation.util.ComputerInput
public class ComputerInput
extends java.lang.Object
Class with static methods to handle computer players' actions.

  • Method Details

    • placeBid

      public static int placeBid​(Hand hand, int numberOfTricks, int totalBidsThusFar, Suit trumpSuit, boolean isDealer)
      Method that handles computer logic for placing a bid.
      Parameters:
      hand - the player's hand.
      numberOfTricks - the round's number of tricks.
      totalBidsThusFar - the total of all the bids already placed by players in the trick.
      trumpSuit - the trump suit of a round.
      isDealer - true if the computer is the dealer, false if the computer is not the dealer.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the player's bid.

    • getPossibleBids

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getPossibleBids​(int totalBidsThusFar, int numberOfTricks, boolean isDealer)
      Method that determines the possible bids that the player can make.
      Parameters:
      totalBidsThusFar - the total of all the bids already placed by players in the trick.
      numberOfTricks - the round's number of tricks.
      isDealer - true if the computer is the dealer, false if the computer is not the dealer.
      Returns:
      a list of integers with possible bids that the player can make.

    • getNumberOfHighRankingCards

      public static int getNumberOfHighRankingCards​(Hand hand, Suit trumpSuit)
      Method to determine the number of high ranking cards, including trump suit cards, in the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      hand - the player's hand.
      trumpSuit - the round's trump suit.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of high ranking cards, including trump suit cards, in the player's hand.

    • playCard

      public static Card playCard​(Hand hand, Suit trumpSuit, java.util.List playedThusFar, boolean isPositiveBidLeft)
      Method that handles computer logic for playing a card if it is not the first player in a trick.
      Parameters:
      hand - the player's hand.
      trumpSuit - the round's trump suit.
      playedThusFar - a list of cards already played in the trick.
      isPositiveBidLeft - true if the number of tricks to win left to reach the player's bid is > 0, false if remaining tricks to win < 0.
      Returns:
      the player's selected card.

    • playFirstCard

      public static Card playFirstCard​(Hand hand, Suit trumpSuit, boolean isPositiveBidLeft)
      Method that handles computer logic for playing a card if it is the first player in a trick.
      Parameters:
      hand - the player's hand.
      trumpSuit - the round's trump suit.
      isPositiveBidLeft - true if the number of tricks to win left to reach the player's bid is > 0, false if remaining tricks to win < 0.
      Returns:
      the player's selected card.

    • getRankedCard

      public static Card getRankedCard​(Hand hand, Suit trumpSuit, boolean getHighest)
      Method that returns a card that is not from a round's trump suit from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      hand - the player's hand.
      trumpSuit - the round's trump suit.
      getHighest - boolean describing if the highest ranking eligible card should be returned.
      Returns:
      the player's selected card.

    • getSuitCard

      public static Card getSuitCard​(Hand hand, Suit suit, boolean getHighest)
      Method that returns a card from a suit from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      hand - the player's hand.
      suit - the suit.
      getHighest - boolean describing if the highest ranking eligible card should be returned.
      Returns:
      the player's selected card.

    • getSuitCardComparedToPlayed

      public static Card getSuitCardComparedToPlayed​(Hand hand, Card highestCard, Suit suit, boolean compareHigherPlayedLowestHand)
      Method that returns a card from a suit from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      hand - the player's hand.
      highestCard - the highest card among cards already played in the trick.
      suit - the suit.
      compareHigherPlayedLowestHand - boolean describing if a card higher than what has been played, but the lowest among these cards, should be returned.
      Returns:
      the player's selected card.

    • getHighestSuitCardPlayed

      public static Card getHighestSuitCardPlayed​(java.util.List<Card> playedThusFar, Suit suit)
      Method that returns a card from a suit from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      playedThusFar - a list of cards already played in the trick.
      suit - the suit.
      Returns:
      the player's selected card.
